data.eml:eml: Amended diagnosis of the genus Nannodiaptomus (Copepoda, Calanoida), based on redescription of N. phongnhaensis and description of a new species from caves in central Vietnam

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tran, Duc Luong, Brancelj, Anton (2017): Amended diagnosis of the genus Nannodiaptomus (Copepoda, Calanoida), based on redescription of N. phongnhaensis and description of a new species from caves in central Vietnam. Zootaxa 4221 (4): 457-476, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4221.4.3
